functionDecorators.name: exchangeCUSD
functionDecorators.description: cUSD can be store onto the exchange service. The value of cUSD (assuming 1 cUSD = USD) in Celo is determined. The celo will be sent to a basket service, where they are held. In return the sender will receive Celo-amount of freshly minted Nylon from the basket service. Requirements: - sufficient cUSD balance of the sender - sufficient Celo balance of the exchange service {exchangeCUSD} is callable by anyone.
